name: 2024 8th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Bioinformatics
content: Publication and Indexï¼š International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science) Or International Journal of Pharma Medicine and Biological Sciences (IJPMBS, ISSN: 2278-5221), which will be indexed by Embase (Under elsevier), CNKI, ProQuest, Google Scholar, etc.
